description: Naan bread makes a quick and easy base for these tasty chicken tikka pizzas.
name: Chicken Tikka Naan Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Place the naan breads on a baking sheet.

Toss the chicken and tikka masala paste together in a bowl to coat. Add the oil to a large pan on medium heat and cook the chicken for 3 minutes, add the onion and capsicums and cook for 5 minutes. Add the spinach a handful at a time and cook until wilted.
Spread a tablespoon of mango chutney on each naan bread, top with the chicken and vegetable mix and dot with paneer cubes.
Bake for 8-10 minutes until golden and serve with chopped coriander on top.
